section.heading: Use of funds; deposit of funds.

para.text: Amounts collected by the District of Columbia under this subchapter shall be deposited into the fund established by ยง 42-3131.01(b)(1).
Amounts in the fund established by ยง 42-3131.01(b)(1), may be used to pay the costs incurred by the District to demolish or enclose a structure under this subchapter.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Apr. 19, 2002, D.C. Law 14-114, ยง 102, 49 DCR 1468
